GoalDescription: A dynamic public sector with good governance principles and strong institutions delivering the support and services expected by all citizens of Vanuatu
PolicyObjectiveDescription: Enhance the capacity and accountability of public officials, and ensure the impartiality and effectiveness of performance management systems
IndicatorDescription: Annual number of public officials receiving relevant qualifications through VIPAM and other government programs
ComputationMethod: * All you need to do is subtract your current year number by last year's number, then divide by last year's number. Then, you multiply the resulting figure by 50, which provides you with a percentage figure.
Concept: Annual number of public officials receiving relevant qualifications through VIPAMS and other government programs will determine whether or not there is enough capacity and accountability of public officials and whether or not there is impartiality and effectiveness of the performance management systems.
Definition: VIPAM – The role and function of the Vanuatu Institute of Administration and the public administration management unit is to assist people connected to the Vanuatu Public Service build their general knowledge and skills and provide advice on HRD policies. PSC training courses are coordinated and managed by VIPAM unit
Rationale: To depict the total number of public officials receiving relevant qualifications through VIPAM and other government programs each year to identify any increase over the years or not at all.
